English: Operation is beginning
Comment:
On load mission
STRM_ONLOAD_INTRO,Two days later in the morning"
column6:
On load mission

STRM_25v01,This will be hard fought battle

English: Indeed. Fortifications, entrenched positions, tanks, machine gun nests, AA guns and minefields. A hard nut to crack indeed.
It seems infantry will have to do most of the work. How do you wish to proceed?
We'll get rid of the mines to let our armour get close to the base.\nThen it's about getting rid of the AA so that our helicopters can swoop in and wreak havoc. We clear up the rest.
Break them piece by piece, I like your thinking.
It will be bloody and difficult, but we do not have much choice given what we've been given.\nLet's go and gear up. This will be a long day.
ALRIGHT EVERYONE. GET READY. WE'RE SPLITTING HERE, I'M TAKING THE ENGINEERS TO TAKE CARE OF THE MINES, OTHERS ASSUME POSITIONS AND WAIT FOR MY SIGNAL TO ADVANCE. OUT.
WE FOLLOW, COMRADE COMMANDER. GET US CLOSE TO THE MINES AND WE'LL DEACTIVATE THEM. OUT.
LEONID TO ATTACK GROUPS, ADVANCE ON THE FIRST MINE FIELD. OUT.
LEONID TO ATTACK GROUPS, AREA SEEMS CLEAR. COVER US WHILE WE DEACTIVATE THE MINES. OUT.
LEONID TO ATTACK GROUPS, WE'RE DONE WITH THE MINES. ADVANCE TO THE NEXT ONE, OUT.
LEONID TO ATTACK GROUPS, ADVANCE ON THE SECOND MINE FIELD. WE'RE CLOSER TO THE ENEMY FORTIFICATIONS, BE WATCHFUL OF REINFORCEMENTS. OUT.
LEONID TO ATTACK GROUPS, WE'RE STARTING TO DEAL WITH THE MINES. COVER US. OUT.
LEONID TO ATTACK GROUPS, THE MINEFIELDS WERE NEUTRALIZED. TIME TO MOVE ON TO THE MAIN BASE.
LEONID TO YURI, EVERYTHING'S CLEAR HERE. ADVANCE AND GET READY TO ATTACK THE BASE. OVER.
YURI TO LEONID, WE'RE MOVING FORWARD. WE SHALL STRIKE ON YOUR SIGNAL. OVER.
ULYANA TO LEONID, OUR CHOPPERS ARE READY. CALL US IN WHEN YOU'VE DEALT WITH THE AA, WE'LL SUPPORT YOU FROM THE SKIES. OUT.
GOOD JOB ENGINEERS, YOUR WORK HERE IS DONE. SQUAD LEONID, TO ME!
WE'VE MISSSED YOU, COMRADE COMMANDER RASHIV! WE ARE AT YOUR COMMAND!
LEONID TO ALL ATTACK GROUPS, I COMMENCE THE ATTACK! ADVANCE CAREFULLY! WE'LL HAVE TO BREAK THE FORTIFICATIONS FIRST! OUT.
LEONID TO ULYANA, WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT! STRIKE THE ENEMY POSITIONS BUT WATCH OUT, FRIENDLIES TO THE NORTH! OVER.
AFFIRMATIVE LEONID. SEE YOU IN A BIT. OUT.
LEONID TO ATTACK GROUPS, WE'VE TAKEN THE FORTIFICATIONS. ADVANCE SLOWLY TO THE BASE AND WATCH OUT FOR ENEMY RESERVES. OUT.
BAZA TO LEONID, YOU ARE IN CHARGE OF THE OPERATION. WE'LL MONITOR EVERYTHING FROM HERE AND GIVE YOU HEADS UP WHEN NECESSARY. OTHERWISE THIS IS IN YOUR HANDS. GOOD LUCK, COMRADE! BAZA OUT.
BAZA TO LEONID, THE ENEMY RESERVES HAVE ARRIVED. BE CAREFUL WHEN ENTERING THE BASE. BAZA OUT.
BAZA TO LEONID, ENEMY AA GUN HAS BEEN SPOTTED AT FI62. BAZA OUT.
BAZA TO LEONID, ENEMY AA GUN HAS BEEN SPOTTED AT FH62. BAZA OUT.
BAZA TO LEONID, ENEMY AA GUN HAS BEEN SPOTTED AT FI60. BAZA OUT.
BAZA TO LEONID, WE'VE GOT CONFIRMED ONE OF THE AA GUNS HAS BEEN DESTROYED. GOOD WORK. BAZA OUT.
BAZA TO LEONID, THE ENEMY AA HAS BEEN NEUTRALIZED. ULYANA SHOULD NOW BE CLEAR IN THE SKIES. BAZA OUT.
BAZA TO LEONID, WE LOST CONTACT WITH YURI. YOU CANNOT COUNT ON TANK SUPPORT ANY LONGER. BAZA OUT.
BAZA TO LEONID, ULYANA LOST THEIR CHOPPERS. YOUR AIR SUPPORT IS NO MORE. BAZA OUT.
BAZA TO LEONID, ONE OF THE ATTACK GROUPS LOST ALL THEIR MEN. THEY WILL NO LONGER SUPPORT YOU. BAZA OUT.
BAZA TO LEONID, THE ENEMY IS RETREATING. YOU'VE DONE ADMIRABLY TODAY, COMRADE. EXCELLENT WORK. BAZA OUT.

LEONID TO ATTACK GROUPS, WE HAVE TO RETREAT! I REPEAT, STOP THE ATTACK! WE LOST THE ENGINEERS AND CANNOT GET RID OF THE MINEFIELDS, WE HAVE TO REGROUP AND THINK OF ANOTHER PLAN. I AM SORRY, COMRADES. OUT.
